name: ChallengeoftheDay
0:
”Alexa, open Challenge of the Day.”
”Alexa, start Challenge of the Day.”
”Alexa, run Challenge of the Day.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: challenge of the day
des:
It is said that it takes 30 days to form a habit. 

Challenge of the day gives you an interesting challenge every day. 

You have to perform that challenge for 30 days to form a habit. 

All the challenges are designed to improve your life and we will keep on adding new and interesting challenges on an ongoing basis. 

Are you ready to accept the challenge?
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
